Any significant neurological condition disorder ( e.g. , seizure disorder , epilepsy , brain tumor , stroke , etc . ) could cause cognitive deterioration suspect MCI . 2 . Any medical condition disorder could produce cognitive deterioration ( i.e. , renal , respiratory , cardiac , hepatic disease , diabetes mellitus , endocrine , metabolic hematological disturbance ) unless well control least 3 month . 3 . Clinically significant abnormal serum TSH and/or B12 and/or folic acid level normal range . 4 . History infective inflammatory brain disease include viral , fungal syphilitic etiology . 5 . Head trauma injury immediately precede cognitive deterioration , unless 2 year pass since full cognitive functional recovery . 6 . Depression screen assess Geriatric Depression Scaleshort version ( score ≥5 ) 7 . Current suicidality screen Columbia Suicidality Severity Rating Scale . 8 . Dementia DSMIV criterion . 9 . Concomitant use medication potent psychotropic property ( e.g . antipsychotic , ADHD treatment , lithium carbonate , antiepileptic drug Gabapentin ) . Sedating antihistamine allow administer last dose administer least 12 hour cognitive test . Usage prescription nonprescription antidepressant agent , lipid lower medication , antihypertensive medication stable dosage 2 month prior study entry permit . 10 . Use within 3 week prior study entry medication anticholinergic effect ( e.g . Atropine , Scopolamine , Tolterodine , Hyoscyamine , Biperiden , Benzatropine , Trihexyphenidyl , Oxybutynin ) . 12 . Use within 4 week prior study entry dietary supplement contain DHA , EPA , Phosphatidylserine , Phosphatidylcholine ( e.g . Krill oil , Lecithin ) , alphaglycerphosphocholine ( GPC ) . 13 . Use within 4 week prior study entry medical food indicate cognitive memory impairment [ e.g . Axona , Cerefolin , CerefolinNAC , Souvenaid ] . 14 .
